snippet: Once again, employers reported that they increased their payrolls at a healthy clip but residents of the city said that they were struggling to find work.
abstract: Once again, employers reported that they increased their payrolls at a healthy clip but residents of the city said that they were struggling to find work.

headline.main: City Gains Jobs, but Unemployment Rises
headline.print_headline: Despite Gain in Jobs, City’s Unemployment Rate Rose to 9.7% Last Month
